snippet: A special committee of Syracuse’s board of trustees said the university’s response to allegations of sexual abuse against Bernie Fine was prompt and done in good faith.
abstract: Syracuse’s board of trustees says there was no attempt to suppress allegations of sexual abuse against former basketball assistant Bernie Fine, who was fired in November: Fine has not been charged and denies the accusations; other college sports items noted.
lead_paragraph: A special committee of Syracuse’s board of trustees said the university’s response to allegations of sexual abuse against Bernie Fine was prompt and done in good faith.
